name: tai ke chapp   台客  傢伙
description:
Thank you for looking at our item.

Be who you want to be in this 100% cotton gray tai ke chapp short sleeved tee.

The idea for this tee came about as creative chapp is based in Taichung City, Taiwan. In Taiwan they use a word called tai ke which is kind of like redneck very local person which we don't think is a bad thing.

Our motto is be who you want to be and now you can in this tai ke chapp tee.

We have S.M.L.XL size, please specify which size you would like with your purchase. Thank you.

Sizes as follows (cm):

S: Shoulders 42 Chest 44 Length 62
M: Shoulders 43 Chest 47 Length 68
L: Shoulders 45 Chest 50 Length 69
XL Shoulders 47 Chest 53 Length 69

Be who you want to be | 做你想要的自己

Thank you once again.

everyone @ creative chapp

name: original chapp    原始 傢伙
description:
Thank you for looking at our item.

Be who you want to be in this 100% cotton gray original chapp short sleeved tee.

The idea for this tee came about as creative chapp is based in Taichung City, Taiwan. We took a trip to an Aboriginal historical site, we were touched and moved by some of the things we saw. This tee is our little nod to the aboriginals of Taiwan.

Be one of the first to wear our original chapp tee
We have S.M.L.XL sizes please specify which size you want with your purchase, thank you.

Thanks once again.

name: taichung chapp    台中市 傢伙
description:
Thank you for looking at our item.

Be who you want to be in this 100% cotton gray taichung chapp short sleeved tee.

The idea for this tee came about as creative chapp is based in Taichung City, Taiwan. We wanted to represent Taichung as we never see any tee's with Taichung, its usually Taipei or New York, L.A. name: ghetto chapp    罪惡城 傢伙
description:
Thank you for looking at our item, Be who you want to be in this 100% cotton gray ghetto chapp short sleeved tee.

The idea for this tee came about as creative chapp is based in Taichung City, Taiwan. Taichung is known for being a little bit tougher and a little bit of a rougher city and we wanted to embrace this part of Taichung in this ghetto chapp tee. We have S.M.L.XL Sizes, please tell us which size you want with your purchase. Thank you.

Sizes as follows (cm):

S: Shoulders 42 Chest 44 Length 62
M: Shoulders 43 Chest 47 Length 68
L: Shoulders 45 Chest 50 Length 69
